title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

description.description: Description of the system to be analyzed.

updated_at.description: Date of last update of hazard analysis.

connections.desciption: Connections present in the project's control structure.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to hazard analysis.

assumptions.description: Assumptions about the system to be analyzed.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to the hazard analysis to which the assumption belongs.

updated_at.description: Date of last update of assumption.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to hazard analysis to which the component belongs.

updated_at.description: Date of last update of component.

controlled_process.description: Components that will be controlled in the system.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to hazard analysis to which the controlled process belongs.

updated_at.description: Date of last controlled process update.

controllers.description: Component responsible for controlling the controlled process in the system.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to hazard analysis to which the controller belongs.

controller_id.description: Foreign key referring to the controller that the control action belongs to.

updated_at.description: Last update date of Creation Action.

controlaction_id.description: Foreign key referring to the control action the rule belongs to.

variable_state.description: define which variable and its value the rule is associated with

context_table.description: Context table generated for control action.

cotrolaction_id.description: foreign key referring to the control action that the context table belongs to.

context.description: Context of the control action that context table belongs to.

ca_provided.description: If providing the studied control action cause hazardous

ca_not_provided.description: If not providing the studied control action cause hazardous.

wrong_time_order.description: If providing the studied control action out of order causes hazardous.

ca_too_early.description: If it provides the studied control action early, it causes hazardous.

ca_too_late.description: if you provide the studied control action late, cause hazardous.

ca_too_soon.description: If it provides the studied control action for a short time, it causes hazardous.

ca_too_long.description: If it provides the control action studied for a long time, it causes hazardous.

updated_at.description: Last update date of context table.

safety_constraint.description: safety restriction to avoid possible unsafe control action

unsafe_control_action.description: context where control action is dangerous.

safety_constraint.description: security measure to avoid unsafe control action.

controlaction_id.description: foreign key referring to the control action to which the safety constraint belongs.

rule_id.description: Foreign key referring to the rule to which the safety constraint belongs.

updated_at.description: Last update date of safety constraint.
Last update date of causal analysis.

rule_safety_constraints_hazards.description: defines which rules and hazards involved with the safety constraint.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to the project which variables belong.

controller_id.description: Foreign key referring to the conroller that has the variable.

variable_id.description: Foreign key referring to the variable that has the state

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to the project that hazard belongs to.

losseshazards.desciption: define which loss is related to this hazard

loss_id.desciption: foreign key referring to the loss.

hazard_id.desciption: foreign key referring to the hazard.

updated_at.description: Last update date of losses hazard.

losses.description: Losses that the analyzed system may have.

project_id.description: Foreign key referring to the project the loss belongs to.
Foreign key referring to the project the mission belongs to
Foreign key referring to the project the sensor belongs to.
Foreign key referring to the project the objective belongs to.

project_id.title: The project_id schema
project_id.description: Foreign key referring to the project that System Safety Constraints belongs to.

updated_at.description: Last update date of System Safety Constraints.

system_safety_constraint_hazards.description: defines which hazards the system safety constraint is bound to.

ssc_id.desciption: foreign key referring to system safety constraint

updated_at.description: Last update date of ssc hazard.
